description: Motorists are being advised to avoid the area between Eastriggs and Gretna.
title: Lorry fire closes A75 near Gretna
title_page: Lorry fire closes A75 near Gretna - BBC News
maintext:
A lorry fire closed part of the A75 in Dumfries and Galloway.
The road was shut between Eastriggs and Gretna, in the east of the region, for about 12 hours.
Police Scotland said emergency services were called to the scene at about 00:10.
No one has been hurt and the Scottish Fire and Rescue Service dealt with the incident.
The road opened at about 12:40.
